com.jmei.service

接口 AddressService


  • public interface AddressService
    地址模块service接口
    从以下版本开始:
    2014-04-26
    作者:
    邹璐

    • 方法概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • searchAllAdressByJid

        java.util.List<com.jmei.bean.Address> searchAllAdressByJid(int jid)
                                                           throws com.jmei.exception.DAOException,
                                                                  com.jmei.exception.AddressIsNotExistException
        根据普通用户id查询所有地址
        参数:
        jid - 普通用户id
        返回:
        List
        返回的Address对象集合
        抛出:
        com.jmei.exception.DAOException - 数据库异常
        com.jmei.exception.AddressIsNotExistException - 没有地址异常

      • addAddress

        void addAddress(com.jmei.bean.Address address)
                throws com.jmei.exception.DAOException,
                       com.jmei.exception.AddressExistException,
                       com.jmei.exception.TelNotExistException,
                       com.jmei.exception.NotHasUsername,
                       com.jmei.exception.NotHasAddress,
                       com.jmei.exception.NotHasDetailAddress
        添加地址
        参数:
        Address - Address对象
        抛出:
        com.jmei.exception.DAOException - 数据库异常
        com.jmei.exception.AddressExistException - 地址已存在异常
        com.jmei.exception.TelNotExistException
        com.jmei.exception.NotHasUsername
        com.jmei.exception.NotHasAddress
        com.jmei.exception.NotHasDetailAddress

      • deleteAddressByJid

        void deleteAddressByJid(int aid)
                        throws com.jmei.exception.DAOException,
                               com.jmei.exception.AddressIsNotExistException
        根据地址id删除地址
        参数:
        aid - 地址id
        抛出:
        com.jmei.exception.DAOException - 数据库异常
        com.jmei.exception.AddressIsNotExistException - 地址不存在异常

      • updateAddressByJid

        void updateAddressByJid(com.jmei.bean.Address address)
                        throws com.jmei.exception.DAOException,
                               com.jmei.exception.AddressIsNull,
                               com.jmei.exception.TelNotExistException,
                               com.jmei.exception.NotHasUsername,
                               com.jmei.exception.NotHasAddress,
                               com.jmei.exception.NotHasDetailAddress
        修改收货地址信息
        参数:
        address - Address对象
        抛出:
        com.jmei.exception.DAOException - 数据库异常
        com.jmei.exception.AddressIsNull - 地址为空异常
        com.jmei.exception.TelNotExistException
        com.jmei.exception.NotHasUsername
        com.jmei.exception.NotHasAddress
        com.jmei.exception.NotHasDetailAddress
